title: Drought Detected
message: NASA SMAP shows low soil moisture. Crops suffer!
fact: NASA's SMAP satellite measures soil moisture globally to predict drought risk.

title: Perfect Rainfall
message: Moderate rain improves soil moisture. Great job!
fact: NASA's GPM satellite tracks precipitation patterns to help farmers plan irrigation.

title: Extreme Heat
message: Temperature exceeds 35°C. Your crops wilt slightly.
fact: NASA's Landsat satellites monitor surface temperature to track heat stress in crops.

title: Vegetation Boost
message: NDVI levels are high — crops thriving!
fact: NASA uses NDVI (Normalized Difference Vegetation Index) to measure plant health from space.

title: Flood Warning
message: NASA Flood Pathfinder shows excess water in fields.
fact: NASA's Flood Pathfinder uses satellite data to predict and monitor flooding events.

title: Pest Alert
message: Satellite thermal imaging detects pest activity!
fact: NASA scientists use thermal imaging to detect pest infestations before they become visible.

title: Frost Warning
fact: NASA's MODIS satellite can detect frost formation in real-time from space.

title: Wind Damage
message: High winds detected by QuikSCAT satellite!
fact: NASA's QuikSCAT satellite measures wind speed to help predict storm damage.

title: Pollination Success
message: Bee activity is optimal for crop pollination!
fact: NASA studies bee populations from space to understand pollination patterns.

title: Harvest Time
message: SMAP data shows perfect harvest conditions!
fact: NASA's SMAP satellite determines optimal harvest timing by measuring soil moisture.

title: Nutrient Deficiency
message: Hyperspectral imaging shows low nitrogen levels.
fact: NASA uses hyperspectral imaging to detect nutrient deficiencies in crops from space.

title: Carbon Sequestration
message: Your farm is helping capture carbon dioxide!
fact: NASA's OCO-2 satellite measures how much CO2 plants absorb from the atmosphere.
